trends: There has been one other sighting in Beebe
There were no other sightings in Beebe on or around January 12th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a clear crisp night so my friend and I went out to take pictures of the night sky. I was looking at the Little Dipper in the southern portion of the sky when I noticed a white flash just below the handle. I took seven pictures with a Fujifilm 10 megapixel digital camera while resting my arm on the roof of the car without using the zoom or flash features.
Summary: Flashing light noted in view finder of camera
